select.name: popuptblSalesReturnStock
select.defineSQL: select tblSalesReturnStock.id f1, tblSalesReturnStock.BillDate f2, tblSalesReturnStock.BillNo f3, tblCompany.ComFullName f4, tblDepartment.DeptFullName f5, tblEmployee.EmpFullName f6, tblSalesReturnStock.TotalTaxAmount f7, tblSalesReturnStock.CurTotalAmount f8, tblSalesReturnStock.InVoiceType f9 from tblSalesReturnStock left join tblCompany on tblSalesReturnStock.CompanyCode=tblCompany.classCode left join tblDepartment on tblSalesReturnStock.DepartmentCode=tblDepartment.classCode left join tblEmployee on tblSalesReturnStock.EmployeeID=tblEmployee.id
select.condition: tblSalesReturnStock.workFlowNodeName ='finish' and LEN(ISNULL(CertificateNo,''))=0 and (AccountAmount!=0 or TotalTaxAmount!=0)
